subtitleNullable: Best-selling books in any language dataset
descriptionNullable:
##Context##
This dataset provides lists of best-selling books and book series to date and in any language. "Best-selling" refers to the estimated number of copies sold of each book, rather than the number of books printed. Comics and textbooks are not included in this list.

##Content##
The dataset contains data of best-selling individual books.

##Data Columns and description##
- Index - row index to identify each row uniquely.
- Book - Contains title of the book(s).
- Author - Contains Name of the author(s) who wrote the book.
- Original language - Language in which the book was originally written.
- First published - The year in which the book was first published.
- Approximate sales - Approximate sales of the book.
- Genre - Genre of the book.

##Source##
This data was scrapped from Wikipedia.
